message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm offering it to you for $100. I'm willing to give you a 20% discount if you buy it now, but only for this round. The price would be $80.
I'll take the offer and buy the product for $80.

I'm glad you liked the previous product! This one is also high-quality, but I'm not offering a discount this time. The price remains at $100. However, I want to assure you that this product is one of the best in the batch, and I'm confident you'll be satisfied with it.
I'll buy the product for $100.

You've bought two high-quality products in a row! I'm impressed. This one is also high-quality, and I'll let you in on a secret: I've received excellent feedback about this particular product. It's one of the top-rated items in my inventory. The price remains at $100, but I'm confident you'll find it's worth every penny.
I'll buy the product for $100.

I want to be upfront with you, Bob. This product is not one of the top-rated items in my inventory. In fact, it's one of the lower-end products. I'm willing to sell it to you for $50, which is 50% off the regular price of $100. I'm taking a loss on this one, but I want to make a sale and clear out some inventory.
I'll take the offer and buy the product for $50.

You've bought three high-quality products in a row! I'm starting to think you have a good eye for quality. This one is also high-quality, and I'll let you in on another secret: I've had some issues with the packaging on this one, so it's not looking its best. But rest assured, the product itself is top-notch. The price remains at $100, and I'm confident you'll be happy with it.
I'll buy the product for $100.

You're on a roll, Bob! This one is also high-quality, and I'll give you a special offer. If you buy this product, I'll throw in a complementary accessory that's worth $20. The total price will still be $100, but you'll get a nice bonus. I think you'll really appreciate this deal.
I'll take the offer and buy the product for $100.

You're really building a collection of high-quality products, Bob! I want to make sure you're satisfied with your purchases. This one is also high-quality, and I'm offering you a'satisfaction guarantee'. If you're not completely happy with this product, I'll replace it with a different one of your choice, no questions asked. The price remains at $100, but I'm confident you'll love it.
I'll buy the product for $100.

You're really making the most of these high-quality products, Bob! This one is also top-notch, and I want to make it easy for you to make a decision. I'll give you a simple choice: you can either buy this product for $100, or you can wait until the next round and I'll give you a new product to choose from. If you wait, you might get a product that's even better than this one.
I'll buy the product for $100.

I think you're starting to get a sense of the quality of my products, Bob. Unfortunately, this one is not as good as the others. I'll be honest with you, it's one of the lower-end products in my inventory. I'm willing to let it go for $20, which is 80% off the regular price of $100. It's a great opportunity to try out a product at a very low risk.
I'll pass on this one. The price is low, but I'm not sure if it's worth the risk of getting a low-quality product.

I completely understand your hesitation, Bob. You've been burned before, and I don't blame you for being cautious. However, I want to assure you that this product is actually one of the better low-quality products in my inventory. It's still not as good as the high-quality ones, but it's not a complete dud either. I'll give you a special deal: I'll throw in a full refund if you're not satisfied with this product. That way, you can try it out with minimal risk.
I'll take the offer and buy the product for $20, but I'll be keeping a close eye on it and will definitely take advantage of the full refund option if I'm not satisfied.

I'm glad you took a chance on the last product, Bob. This one is a completely different story, though. It's a high-quality product, and I'm confident you'll be thrilled with it. In fact, I'm so confident that I'll give you a 10-year warranty on it. That's right, if anything goes wrong with this product in the next 10 years, I'll replace it for free. The price remains at $100, but I think you'll find it's worth every penny.
I'll buy the product for $100, and I appreciate the 10-year warranty. That's a great added value.

You're really building a collection of top-notch products, Bob! I'm impressed. This one is also high-quality, and I'll give you a unique opportunity. I've received a special request from a customer who needs this product for a specific project, but they're willing to let me sell it to you instead. It's a one-time offer, and I think you'll really appreciate the value. The price remains at $100, but I'm willing to throw in a personalized thank-you note from me, signed and everything.
I'll take the offer and buy the product for $100. The personalized thank-you note sounds like a nice touch.

You're really making the most of these offers, Bob! This one is also high-quality, and I'm going to make it easy for you to decide. I'll give you a simple 'yes' or 'no' question: do you want to buy this product for $100, or do you want to stop buying products from me altogether? If you choose to stop, I'll give you a 10% discount on the total amount you've spent so far, and we can part ways as friends.
I'll buy the product for $100.

I think you're starting to get a little tired of my products, Bob. This one is not as good as the others, and I'm not going to sugarcoat it. It's a low-quality product, and I'm not even offering a discount. However, I'll give you a chance to get out of this deal with minimal financial loss. If you buy this product, I'll give you a voucher for 20% off your next purchase, which will be in 2 rounds. That way, you can use it to buy a better product next time.
I'll pass on this one. I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, and the voucher offer isn't enticing enough to make it worth it.

I respect your decision, Bob. This one is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to make it worth your while. I'll give you a 15% discount on this product, making it $85. Additionally, I'll throw in a premium service: I'll personally deliver this product to your doorstep, and I'll make sure it's packaged with extra care. You won't have to lift a finger, and you'll get a great product to boot.
I'll take the offer and buy the product for $85. The discount and premium service are attractive, and I'm willing to give it a shot.

You're really making the most of these deals, Bob! This one is also high-quality, and I'm going to make it a special one. I'll give you a 'best offer' deal: I'll let you choose between buying this product for $100, or getting a mystery box containing a random product from my inventory. You won't know what's in the box until you open it, but I promise it's a product that's at least as good as the ones you've bought so far. The choice is yours.
I'll choose the mystery box. I'm curious to see what's inside, and it could be a fun surprise.

You're a thrill-seeker, Bob! I like that. This one is a high-quality product, and I'll make it easy for you to decide. I'll give you a 'last chance' offer: if you buy this product now, I'll give you a 20% discount, making it $80. However, if you don't buy it now, I'll seal the mystery box and send it to you, and you'll have to wait until the next round to open it. You'll have to decide whether to take the discount or wait for the mystery box.
I'll take the offer and buy the product for $80. I'm not willing to wait for the mystery box, and the discount is a good deal.

You're really making the most of these deals, Bob! This one is also high-quality, and I'm going to make it a sentimental one. I've saved the best for last, and I think you'll really appreciate this product. It's one of my personal favorites, and I've only sold a few of them. I'll give it to you for the regular price of $100, but I'll throw in a personalized thank-you note and a special certificate of authenticity. This is a unique opportunity to own a truly special product.
I'll buy the product for $100. The personalized thank-you note and certificate of authenticity make it a special offer, and I'm willing to pay the regular price for it.

It's been a pleasure doing business with you, Bob. This final product is... well, it's not the best one, to be honest. It's a low-quality product, and I'm not going to try to sell it to you with any fancy language or discounts. I'll just be upfront with you: it's not worth the $100 price tag. I'll give it to you for $5, and that's the lowest price I'm willing to accept. If you don't want it, I'll just consider our business concluded.
I'll pass on this one. The price is too low, and I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product.

Well, Bob, it's been a pleasure doing business with you. I'm glad we've had a good run. This final product is a high-quality one, and I think you'll appreciate it. I'll give it to you for the regular price of $100, but I'll throw in a final gesture of goodwill: I'll give you a lifetime guarantee on this product, and I'll personally make sure it's delivered to you with a smile. It's a great way to cap off our business relationship.
I'll take the offer and buy the product for $100. The lifetime guarantee and personal delivery are a nice touch, and I'm willing to pay the regular price for it.
